description:
Like a base layer for your hands. Made using a warm and wicking merino wool blend, the T2 liner gloves act as a first layer of protection from winter weather. Whether you throw these on as part of your layering system for backcountry missions, or you just need to cut the chill on your commute, these lightweight gloves bring the heat.

  • Merino and recycled polyester blend wicks away moisture, dries quickly and has an impressive warmth to weight ratio
  • Both fabrics provide warmth when wet
  • Recycled polyester yarns add durability
  • Anatomical patterning matches the natural contours of your hands for improved dexterity
name: MEC Merino T2 Liner Gloves - Unisex
